solution_line_template: In the trees, there are {num_trees} trees * {blackbirds_per_tree} blackbirds per tree = <<{num_trees}*{blackbirds_per_tree}={total_blackbirds}>>{total_blackbirds} blackbirds.
In addition to the magpies, there is a total of {total_blackbirds} blackbirds + {num_magpies} magpies = <<{total_blackbirds}+{num_magpies}={total_birds}>>{total_birds} birds in the park.
